title: What extra Benefits you get on enrolment?
text: If you enrol in this program, you would get from next day the access to all our present & future Recorded courses made available on podtest.in at free of cost.
text2: Currently we already have in-depth high quality content courses on Java | Selenium | Maven | TestNg | Git | Framework Design using POM Pattern | Jenkins , atleast 10+ courses are in edit phase
